contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Station | name= Kiest | type= [[Dallas Area Rapid Transit|DART]] [[light rail]] station | image=Kiest (DART station).JPG | image_size= | image_caption= | address= 3500 East Lancaster Road<br>Dallas, Texas 75203 | coordinates={{coord|32|42|26|N|96|48|4|W|type:railwaystation_region:US-TX|display=inline,title}} | line={{rail color box|system=DART|line=Blue}} | other=DART Routes {{DART LB|405}}, {{DART LB|444}}, {{DART RFB|522}} (M-Sat), and {{DART RFB|541}} | platform=[[Island platform]] | parking=465 free spaces, no overnight | bicycle=One rack | passengers= | pass_year= | pass_percent= | opened=May 31, 1997<ref name="June 1, 1997">{{cite news |first=Linda Stewart |last=Ball |work=The Dallas Morning News |title=DART opens 3 new miles of rail in Oak Cliff: New tracks serving line between Illinois Avenue, Ledbetter Drive |date=June 1, 1997}}</ref> | rebuilt= | ADA=Yes | code= | owned= [[Dallas Area Rapid Transit]] | zone= | services= {{s-rail|title=DART}} {{s-line|system=DART|line=Blue|previous=VA Medical Center|next=Illinois}} }} '''Kiest Station''' is a [[DART Light Rail]] station located in the [[Oak Cliff]] neighborhood of [[Dallas, Texas|Dallas]], [[Texas]] ([[United States|USA]]) on Kiest Boulevard and Lancaster Road ([[Texas State Highway 342|SH 342]]). It opened on May 31, 1997, and is a station on the {{DART B}}, serving nearby residences and businesses. == References == {{reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.dart.org/riding/stations/kieststation.asp DART - Kiest Station] {{Dallas Area Rapid Transit}} [[Category:Dallas Area Rapid Transit light rail stations]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1997]]
